utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Good morning everyone. I'm Jennifer Martinez, the project lead.

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Hi Jennifer! I'm Robert Chen, the backend developer on this project.

utterances.speaker: C
utterances.text: And I'm Amy Parker, handling the frontend work. Nice to meet you both!

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great! So, Robert, can you tell us about the API architecture?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure, Jennifer. I've designed it with scalability in mind. Amy will be consuming these APIs.

utterances.speaker: C
utterances.text: That's perfect, Robert! Jennifer, when do you think we can start integration?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Amy, we should be ready next week. Robert, can you have the docs ready by then?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Absolutely, Jennifer. I'll send them to Amy by Wednesday.

utterances.speaker: C
utterances.text: Thanks, Robert! Jennifer, I'll keep you posted on the progress.
